term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - fine structure constant, α
term.title: fine structure constant

item.text: Atomic fundamental physical constant, α = (µ0/e2)c0.2h = 7.297 353 08 (33) x 10-3, where µ 0 is the permeability of vacuum, e the elementary charge, h the Planck constant, and c0 the speed of light.
